backend/BatsmanPerformance.mo: Defines the BatsmanPerformance type with fields for batting stats including runs, balls, boundaries, and innings.
backend/BowlerPerformance.mo: Defines the BowlerPerformance type containing bowling stats such as overs, maidens, runs conceded, wickets, and balls bowled.
backend/FielderPerformance.mo: Defines the FielderPerformance type with fields for catches, stumpings, and total dismissals.
backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining players, teams, matches, scorecards, auctions, and related storage and helper functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old match records to a new format by adding an empty bowlersByInnings map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of all major frontend files, components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing steps for building, deploying, testing, and rolling back the frontend and backend canisters.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file enabling dark mode and loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, profile setup modal logic, and document title initialization.
frontend/src/components/AdminHeader.tsx: Header component showing admin info and handling navigation and authentication actions.
frontend/src/components/AuctionSummary.t: Displays aggregated auction stats and per‑team summaries with CSV export support.
frontend/src/components/LeadingTeamIndic: Renders a badge highlighting the team currently leading in an auction.
frontend/src/components/MatchInningsScor: Provides authenticated UI for editing batsman and bowler performance per innings.
Manages match creation, listing, and editing results, including dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/components/PlayerAuctionDia: Dialog for conducting player auctions, handling bidding, increments, and auction state.
frontend/src/components/PlayerManagement: UI for creating, editing, deleting, assigning players, and launching player auctions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects a user's name and saves their profile via a mutation with basic validation and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/TeamBoughtPlayer: Displays players bought by a team, handling loading, error, and empty states using badges and skeletons.
frontend/src/components/TeamHeader.tsx: Header showing team name, purse, and authentication controls with navigation and identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/TeamManagement.t: Admin interface for creating teams, editing team purse and name, and managing team owners and players.
frontend/src/components/TeamMatches.tsx: Shows match list filtered by team with loading/error states and displays scores, dates, locations, and win/loss badges.
frontend/src/components/TeamOwnersManage: Manages team owners including adding/removing principals and editing owner display names with dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/components/TournamentFixtur: Generates and previews round-robin tournament fixtures, validating inputs and triggering fixture generation via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating player, team, match, and user profile data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard UI with tabs for managing players, teams, matches, auctions, and tournaments.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login interface, handles Internet Identity login, and redirects users based on their profile role.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDashboardPage.tsx: Shows a team’s dashboard with players, purse details, and matches, allowing team selection when no profile team is set.
frontend/src/utils/csvExport.ts: Generates a CSV summary of team auction data and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/roundRobin.ts: Creates round‑robin fixtures by pairing all teams into sequential rounds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, features, and pending requirements for per‑innings scorecard functionality.
